Medigap.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a system in the US by which people who have Medicaid pay money to a company so that they can receive additional medical care and services that they need
Medigap.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: My mom has to pay high premiums every month for Medigap to cover prescription drugs.
Medigap.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a type of private medical insurance in the US that covers costs not paid by Medicare
Medigap.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Congress has now enacted legislation to standardize Medigap policies.
